column1: Smoque BBQ////Five stars for the St. Lois ribs (spare ribs). Those in the know get these
column5: nicely seasoned. I eat them without the sauce. Good meat is like that
column6: it doesn't need the extras. The wait can be long
column7: and parking can mean a walk.  BUT this is a popular city restaurant  and should be expected. I've seen many good places become a victim of their own success by expanding and losing their quality and price point.
